<!DOCTYPE html>
        <html>
        <head>
            <meta charset="utf-8">

            <style>
                body {
                    font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                    color: #fff;
                    background: #181818;
                }

                header {
                    background: #073648;
                }

                header > img {
                    width: 140px;
                    padding: 20px;
                }

                main {
                    text-align: center;
                }

                h1 {
                    margin: 40px 0 0;
                }

                ol {
                    padding: 0;
                }

                .instruction {
                    display: inline-block;
                    margin: 20px;
                }
            </style>

            <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
            <script src="//plus.google.com/hangouts/_/api/v1/hangout.js"></script>

            <script>

                var listUsers = function () {
                    var hangoutId = gapi.hangout.getHangoutId();
                    var hangoutUrl = gapi.hangout.getHangoutUrl();
                    var participants = gapi.hangout.getEnabledParticipants();
                    var topic = gadgets.views.getParams()['appData'];

                    var data = {
                        hangoutId: hangoutId,
                        hangoutUrl: hangoutUrl,
                        participants: participants,
                        topic:topic,
                    };

                    data = JSON.stringify(data);

                    console.log("->",topic);


                    var ajax = new XMLHttpRequest();
                    ajax.open('POST', 'https://public-hangouts.com/api/groups');
                    ajax.setRequestHeader('Content-type', 'application/json');
                    ajax.send(data);
                }

                gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(function () {
                    gapi.hangout.onParticipantsRemoved.add(listUsers);
                    listUsers();

                    var participants = gapi.hangout.getEnabledParticipants();
                    console.log(participants);
                });

            </script>
        </head>

        <body>
        </body>
        </html>
